Class Kiva

  • java.lang.Object
    • Kiva

  • public class Kiva
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the main Kiva class that instantiates a Kiva robot and moves the object around a map given user input.
    Version:
    4/5/21
    Author:
    Kevin Phan

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Kiva(FloorMap map)
      Initializes new Kiva robot and sets currentLocation to initialLocation set on map passed in constructor.
      Kiva(FloorMap map, edu.duke.Point currentLocation)
      Initializes new Kiva robot and sets location to currentLocation value passed in constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      edu.duke.Point getCurrentLocation()
      Returns current location of Kiva object on map.
      FacingDirection getDirectionFacing()
      Returns most current direction Kiva is assigned to.
      long getMotorLifetime()
      Gets total number of seconds Kiva has incurred.
      boolean isCarryingPod()
      Returns state of whether carrying pod or not.
      boolean isSuccessfullyDropped()
      Returns state of whether dropped or not.
      void move(KivaCommand command)
      Moves Kiva object's location based on KivaCommand passed in.
      void podExceptionTester(int x, int y)
      Modified currentLocation value by receiving incremented x and y value of upcoming location to conduct exception test before currentLocation value is updated.
      void setCurrentLocation(int x, int y)
      Updates currentLocation by receiving incremented x and y value in correspondence with move() method.

      • podExceptionTester

        public void podExceptionTester(int x,
                               int y)
        Modified currentLocation value by receiving incremented x and y value of upcoming location to conduct exception test before currentLocation value is updated.
        Parameters:
        int - x and y coordinates that provide where pod should be in next move.

      • setCurrentLocation

        public void setCurrentLocation(int x,
                               int y)
        Updates currentLocation by receiving incremented x and y value in correspondence with move() method.
        Parameters:
        int - x and y coordinates that provide new location.
